EmailTemplate.description: 16/04/2013 BSKL out of hours learning sports clubs
EmailTemplate.name: 16/04/2013 BSKL out of hours learning sports clubs
EmailTemplate.subject: BSKL out of hours learning sports clubs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for your support last term with regards to our out of school hours sports clubs. Please take note the following sports clubs will be running again this term: Football, Rugby, Basketball and Gymnastics. The clubs are open to BSKL students and run for 8 weeks. Please click on the link below for further information on how to register, times & dates, contact information and cost. The clubs will all begin next week on the stated dates and times.
Football (there are very limited places and all of last terms students are automatically enrolled unless they have informed Mr Thomson) ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTT/j7h.hm79fMDyG3uOV1auVQqaOLq18UL8z7RLehDJApc= )
Rugby (again, limited places available) ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTJ/mIEpgcIiDlBQlPYxRsz0N0K9HKl2eWSyEK.c0Vd3zW4= )
Basketball ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTO/3hdBdNT7CGyyFJ8j7HTYvmcv.Xr5L6qoRSX6CbjJBEQ= )
Gymnastics ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTY/KDAZWyOzeeJ6qZ9t81bO12jrehxBNMZ5svqH7DjWS.I= )
Kind regards,
Harrie Thomson Head of Physical Education
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
